level1.question: Can two people working together complete a task faster than one person alone?
If A can complete a task in 5 days and B can complete the same task in 10 days, how long will it take for both A and B to complete the task together?
If it takes 4 workers 10 days to complete a job, how long will it take 8 workers to complete the same job?
A and B can complete a work together in 12 days. If A alone can complete it in 20 days, how many days will B take to complete it alone?
Is it true that if one person can do a job faster than another, they are more efficient?
If a task takes 6 hours for 3 people to complete, how long would it take for 6 people to complete the same task?
A worker is paid $300 for a task. If the worker takes 15 days to complete the task, what is their daily wage?
If 10 workers can build a wall in 8 days, how many days will 5 workers take to build the same wall?
If A and B together can complete a task in 6 days, and A alone can complete it in 9 days, how long will it take B to complete it alone?
Does doubling the number of workers always halve the time required to complete a job?
If one person can complete a job in 24 hours, how many people would it take to complete the same job in 6 hours?
If two workers can complete a task in 8 hours, how long will it take for four workers to complete the same task?
If A can do a job in 10 days and B can do the same job in 15 days, how long will it take for both of them working together to complete it?
Is it true that if more workers are added to a job, the time required to complete it decreases proportionally?
If a job takes 20 hours for 5 workers to complete, how many hours would it take for 10 workers to complete the job?
If 3 workers can complete a task in 9 hours, how long will it take 1 worker to complete the task alone?
If A can complete a work in 10 days and B in 15 days, how long will they take to complete it together?
If it takes 4 workers 10 days to complete a job, how long will it take 8 workers to complete the same job?
Can the work be completed faster if the efficiency of the workers increases?
If A and B can complete a work together in 12 days. If A alone can complete it in 20 days, how many days will B take to complete it alone?
If A, B, and C can complete a task in 6 days, and A alone can complete it in 12 days, how long will it take for B and C to complete the task together?
If a person can complete a job in 24 hours, how many people are needed to complete the job in 6 hours?
If two workers can complete a task in 8 hours, how long will it take for four workers to complete the same task?
If 3 workers can complete a task in 12 hours, how long will it take for 6 workers to complete the same task?
If A can complete a task in 5 days and B in 10 days, how long will it take for both A and B to complete the task together?
